segments.text: What are you doing here today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to fight my ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the arresting officer in the courtroom today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the officer is here today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was pulled over for running a red light , but I never did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you believe that the officer lied ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There was a camera on the signal . So , he was obviously lying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your license plate was caught on camera ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A picture of my license plate was never taken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Since there is no picture of your license plate on record , I'm going to let you go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I'm glad that you believe me .
segments.speaker: S2
